CON100103: Explore frequently asked questions about employee work hours, leave, attendance, and assessments.
CON100104: How can employeesâ€™ work hours be tracked effectively?
CON100105: Work hours can be tracked using timesheets, attendance systems, or the employee dashboard, which allows monitoring of the time spent on each task accurately.
CON100107: How can Time Management improve productivity?
CON100108: By allocating the right amount of time to tasks, avoiding distractions, and setting clear deadlines, you can complete work faster and more accurately.
CON100110: How can time be managed for multiple projects at once?
CON100111: By using project/task management tools, scheduling tasks, and tracking deadlines, time can be managed across multiple projects effectively.
CON100113: What is the process for employees to log in to the ESS portal?
CON100114: Employees can log in using their employee ID and password provided by HR or IT. Some portals may also support Single Sign-On (SSO) for secure access.
CON100116: How can leave be applied and leave balance checked?
CON100117: In the Leave section, employees can submit leave requests for approval and view their current leave balance.
CON100119: How do employees track approval status for leave or timesheets?
CON100120: Employees can check the status of submitted requests (approved, pending, or rejected) in the Leave or Timesheet sections.
CON100122: How are employees assigned to assessments?
CON100123: Administrators can assign employees to specific assessments, ensuring that only the relevant individuals participate in the evaluation process.
CON100126: The system tracks scores, completion status, and individual question responses, allowing managers and HR to evaluate employee performance accurately.
CON100129: The frequency of assessments depends on organizational policies, project requirements, or training programs, and can range from monthly, quarterly, or annually.
CON100131: How can approvers provide comments or feedback?
CON100132: Approvers can add comments or notes in the system when approving, rejecting, or requesting additional information.
CON100134: How are late arrivals or early departures tracked?
CON100135: The system logs exact check-in and check-out times, allowing managers to monitor punctuality and compliance with work schedules.
CON100137: Can attendance be corrected if there is an error?
CON100138: Yes, employees can request corrections, which are then reviewed and approved by their manager or HR.
